LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_NormalChild.title: Elf Village Kid
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_NormalChild.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his childhood in an Elven village as [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_SlaveChild.title: Elf Child Slave
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_SlaveChild.baseDescript: [PAWN_nameDef] has a history of being captured and sold as [PAWN_pronoun]
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_HunterAdult.title: Elf Hunter
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_HunterAdult.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] was once [PAWN_pronoun] for a small village of Half-Elves.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_SlaveAdult.title: Elf Slave
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_NormalAdult.title: Elf Civilian
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKHunterAdult.title: Elf Master Hunter
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKHunterAdult.baseDescr: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the most skilled hunters in the village.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_KnightAdult.title: Elf Knight
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_KnightAdult.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] is [PAWN_pronoun] who can protect the village from enemies.
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKKnightAdult.title: Elf Guardian Knight
LanguageData.AS_WAE_Backstory_PKKnightAdult.baseDescr: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the strongest of the knights that protect the village.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_a.title: Half-Elf Village Kid
LanguageData.AS_WHE_BackstoryChild_a.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent their childhood in a small Half-Elf settlement.
